action: Switch on all the lights in a room
action_description: This action will switch on all the lights in the room you select.
This action will move the roller you select at the given opening percentage.
This action will switch on all your lights.

action: Switch off all the lights in a room
action_description: This action will switch off all the lights in the room you select.
This action will switch on all your sockets.
This action will switch off the socket you select.
This action will invert the socket you select

action: Invert all the sockets in a room
action_description: This action will invert all your sockets in the room you select.

action: Move all the rollers in a room
action_description: This action will move all the rollers in the room you select.

action: Switch on all the sockets in a room
action_description: This action will switch on all your sockets in the room you select.
This action will invert the state of the light you select.
This action will move all your rollers.
This action will invert all your sockets.
This action will invert all your lights.
This action will switch on the light you select.
This action will switch on the socket you select.
This action will switch off all your sockets.
This action will switch off the light you select.
This action will switch off all your lights.

action: Invert all the lights in a room
action_description: This action will invert all the lights in the room you select.

action: Switch off all the sockets in a room
action_description: This action will switch off all your sockets in the room you select.
